item.description:
What Kind of Medical Device Company Do You (Want To) Work For?

 

Join guest investors, consultants and operating business leaders as they dissect selected company models (the traditional model, the virtual model and an attractive model alternative) and tell us how you can bring innovation today - and in the future -to these businesses.

 

Moderator:

Dan Allred, Senior Relationship Manager, Silicon Valley Bank

 

Panelists:

Geoff Pardo, CEO, Facet Solutions/Partner, Spray Ventures

Mel Prenovitz, CEO, EndoSphere Surgical

Chris Palatucci, PhD., Palatucci Executive Search LLC 

 

Date: March 2, 2010
Time: 5:30 - 8:30PM
Location: Foley Hoag Emerging Enterprise Center, 1000 Winter Street, Waltham, MA
Info: judy@vitalnow.net

http://web.memberclicks.com/mc/community/eventdetails.do?eventId=288187&orgId=meg&recurringId=0
item.name: What Kind of Medical Device Company Do You (Want To) Work For?
